Uses of Validatable in org.cse.client
 

Classes in org.cse.client that implement Validatable
 class AbstractPanel
          Abstract panel is to contain widgets allowing end user to perform a single action in the flow of the application.
 class AnnotationsPanel
          Panel wrapping controls allowing end user to fetch bookmarks and to be able to generate CSE annotations for further consumption.
 class ContextPanel
          Panel wrapping controls allowing end user to compile CSE context based on the tag and annotation information captured by other panels.
 class Controller
          The controller provides with utilities which include: I18NFactory, UIHelper, Application implementation and notifications via ChangeListener
 class MainPanel
          The Main panel is responsible for configuring and linking all application panels.
 class TagProviderPanel
          Panel wrapping controls allowing end user to fetch tags and configure them for further consumption.
